name: admin.functions.list
desc: Look up functions by a set of apps

app_ids.desc: Comma-separated array of app IDs to get functions for; max 50.

cursor.desc: Set cursor to next_cursor returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

limit.desc: The number of results that will be returned by the API on each invocation. Must be between 1 and 1000, both inclusive.

team_id.desc: The team context to retrieve functions from.

errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.
errors.not_allowed: The user is not allowed to access this API method
errors.restricted_action: The user is not allowed to access this API method
